goal.en: “Financial Statement Analysis Taught in English Conduct the fundamental analysis on a company and finish a high quality security analysis report“
goal.ch: “Financial Statement Analysis Taught in English Conduct the fundamental analysis on a company and finish a high quality security analysis report“

content.en:
“Week 01: Introduction
Week 02-04: Financial Projection ＆ Modeling
Week 05-07: Business Analysis
Week 08-09: Financial Analysis
Week 10-13: Valuation Methods: Cash Flow Based, Multiple Based
Week 14: Investment Recommendation
Week 15~: Other Optional Topics
Final Exam Week: Final Presentation
1st hour activities: Model presentations, progress reports“

textbook.en: “Recommended Readings: Security Analysis and Business Valuation on Wall Street (2nd ed.) by Hooke, Wiley, 2010 Investment Banking: Valuation, Leverage Buyouts, and Mergers ＆ Acquisitions (3rd ed.), by Rosenbaum and Pearl, Wiley, 2021 Other References: Financial Modeling and Valuation: A Practical Guide to Investment Banking and Private Equity (2nd ed.) by Pignataro, Wiley, 2022 Financial Statement Analysis: A Valuation Approach (International Edition) by Soffer and Soffer, Pearson, 2002“
